thread.title: Two Soldiers Killed in Fort Campbell Helicopter Crash

author: wsjcom
title: Two Soldiers Killed in Fort Campbell Helicopter Crash

locations.name: fort campbell helicopter crash fort campbell

text:
FORT CAMPBELL, Ky.—Army officials say two soldiers were killed in a helicopter crash at a Fort Campbell training area.
Fort Campbell officials say the AH-64E Apache helicopter crashed Friday night. The sprawling Army post straddles the Kentucky-Tennessee line.
The soldiers’ names were not immediately released pending notification to their families.... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
